thread.title: Richard Marx to play Genesee in December
thread.title_full: Richard Marx to play Genesee in December - DailyHerald.com

author: dailyherald.com
title: Richard Marx to play Genesee in December
text:
Singer-songwriter Richard Marx, the Chicago native best known for the hit song "Right Here Waiting," will perform at Waukegan's Genesee Theatre on Friday, Dec. 4.
Tickets to the 8 p.m. concert go on sale to the public at 10 a.m. Friday, Oct. 16. Tickets, which range from $28 to $68, will be available by calling (800) 982-2787 or at ticketmaster.com .
